thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SendGrid Posts Q4 ‍loss Per Share $0.09​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SendGrid Posts Q4 ‍loss Per Share $0.09​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - SendGrid Inc:
* SENDGRID ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES INITIAL 2018 OUTLOOK
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $31.9 MILLION TO $32.1 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 38 PERCENT TO $31.7 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 25 PERCENT * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $139 MILLION TO $141 MILLION * ‍EXPECTS APPROXIMATELY A BREAK-EVEN AMOUNT OF NON-GAAP ADJUSTED NET INCOME IN Q1 2018​
* QTRLY ‍LOSS PER SHARE $0.09​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
